name: SlimeBox
description:
A small little game about a box-shaped slime trying to eat to grow fast, fast, faster! Try to gather as many points as you can within the time limit! 

(Hint: Less speed doesn't necessarily mean being slower!)

Install Instructions: Download the version that suits your computer's OS, unzip the .rar file, and double-click on SlimeBox to run the game!

(Please close and re-open SlimeBox in order to play again. There is currently not yet a replay button.)
